Message:
Today I explored
the nice man’s town.

I’ve been around red
so much that seeing
all the different
colors felt kind of...

This town didn’t have
the red I’m looking for
either, but...

I still like it here,
because he’s here!

Though, it seems like bad
things happen even in his town.

While I was walking around,
I met a bad doll.

They hit Emma...
and pulled my hair!

What a bad doll...
Bullying someone smaller
than them like that...

So Emma scolded them.
Poor Emma... It hurt, didn’t it?
